"""

Lio Movie Chatbot

- Fullscreen dark blue app (#191970)
- Ask user name
- Mood buttons (Good/Bad/Okay) with reactions
- Age groups: Under 15 / Under 18 / 18-25 / 25+
- Language: Hindi / English
- 2 personality questions mapping to 8 genres A-H
- tally = {'A':0,'B':0,'C':0,'D':0,'E':0,'F':0,'G':0,'H':0}
- show_recommendations_from_tally() -> show_recommendations(genre_code)
- Genres dictionary with nested age groups and YouTube trailer links
- Age-appropriate clickable movie buttons that open YouTube
- Restart/Exit buttons
- Modern cyan buttons, white text, professional dark theme
- Escape exits fullscreen
- start_main_chatbot() to launch

"""

import tkinter as tk
from tkinter import font
import webbrowser
import random


class LioMovieChatbotGUI:
    def __init__(self):
        # Core state
        self.root = tk.Tk()
        self.root.title("Lio Movie Chatbot")
        self.root.configure(bg="#191970")  # dark blue background
        self.root.attributes("-fullscreen", True)  # start fullscreen
        self.root.bind("<Escape>", lambda e: self.root.attributes("-fullscreen", False))

        # Fonts and styles
        self.header_font = font.Font(family="Helvetica", size=28, weight="bold")
        self.text_font = font.Font(family="Helvetica", size=14)
        self.button_font = font.Font(family="Helvetica", size=12, weight="bold")

        self.cyan = "#00CED1"  # modern cyan
        self.cyan_hover = "#20E0E6"
        self.white = "#FFFFFF"

        # Conversation variables
        self.username = None
        self.language = "English"
        self.age_group = None
        self.mood = None

        # EXACT tally structure requested
        self.tally = {'A': 0, 'B': 0, 'C': 0, 'D': 0, 'E': 0, 'F': 0, 'G': 0, 'H': 0}

        # Genres dictionary with nested age groups and youtube trailer links
        self.genres = {
            'A': {  # Romance
                'Under 15': [("The Notebook (PG-appropriate clip)", "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FC6biTjEyZw")],
                'Under 18': [("The Notebook (Trailer)", "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FC6biTjEyZw")],
                '18-25': [("The Notebook (Trailer)", "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FC6biTjEyZw")],
                '25+': [("The Notebook (Trailer)", "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FC6biTjEyZw")],
            },
            'B': {  # Thriller
                'Under 15': [("Inception (clip)", "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8hP9D6kZseM")],
                'Under 18': [("Inception (Trailer)", "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8hP9D6kZseM")],
                '18-25': [("Inception (Trailer)", "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8hP9D6kZseM")],
                '25+': [("Inception (Trailer)", "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8hP9D6kZseM")],
            },
            'C': {  # Comedy
                'Under 15': [("Superbad (clip)", "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4eaZ_48ZYog")],
                'Under 18': [("Superbad (Trailer)", "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4eaZ_48ZYog")],
                '18-25': [("Superbad (Trailer)", "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4eaZ_48ZYog")],
                '25+': [("Superbad (Trailer)", "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4eaZ_48ZYog")],
            },
            'D': {  # SciFi/Fantasy
                'Under 15': [("Interstellar (clip)", "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zSWdZVtXT7E")],
                'Under 18': [("Interstellar (Trailer)", "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zSWdZVtXT7E")],
                '18-25': [("Interstellar (Trailer)", "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zSWdZVtXT7E")],
                '25+': [("Interstellar (Trailer)", "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zSWdZVtXT7E")],
            },
            'E': {  # Historical/Crime
                'Under 15': [("Sherlock Holmes (clip)", "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ih0iu80u04Y")],
                'Under 18': [("Sherlock Holmes (Trailer)", "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ih0iu80u04Y")],
                '18-25': [("Sherlock Holmes (Trailer)", "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ih0iu80u04Y")],
                '25+': [("Sherlock Holmes (Trailer)", "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ih0iu80u04Y")],
            },
            'F': {  # Marvel
                'Under 15': [("Avengers: Endgame (clip)", "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TcMBFSGVi1c")],
                'Under 18': [("Avengers: Endgame (Trailer)", "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TcMBFSGVi1c")],
                '18-25': [("Avengers: Endgame (Trailer)", "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TcMBFSGVi1c")],
                '25+': [("Avengers: Endgame (Trailer)", "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TcMBFSGVi1c")],
            },
            'G': {  # DC
                'Under 15': [("The Dark Knight (clip)", "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EXeTwQWrcwY")],
                'Under 18': [("The Dark Knight (Trailer)", "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EXeTwQWrcwY")],
                '18-25': [("The Dark Knight (Trailer)", "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EXeTwQWrcwY")],
                '25+': [("The Dark Knight (Trailer)", "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EXeTwQWrcwY")],
            },
            'H': {  # Indian Movies
                'Under 15': [("3 Idiots (clip)", "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K0eDlFX9GMc")],
                'Under 18': [("3 Idiots (Trailer)", "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K0eDlFX9GMc")],
                '18-25': [("3 Idiots (Trailer)", "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K0eDlFX9GMc")],
                '25+': [("3 Idiots (Trailer)", "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K0eDlFX9GMc")],
            }
        }

        # Main container
        self.container = tk.Frame(self.root, bg="#191970")
        self.container.pack(expand=True, fill="both")

        # Overlay frame used to show messages and question screens
        self.overlay = None

        # Start directly from name (no login)
        self.ask_name()
